heroHeadingPrim: Still trying to figure out how to build your digital spot online?
heroHeadingSec: I will help you with the fundamental piece: A beautiful website.
heroTextSec: I help businesses build their digital presence with utmost care.

aboutContent.Developer: With over 3 years of experience in Python, I am very  passionate about coding. Sometimes, when I'm in 'the Zone', I even forget to eat and drink.
